section.name: ToolLoader Reference Documentation
section.p: A view tool that allows template designers to load view tools from within the template. Any object with a public constructor without parameters can be loaded into the context.

method.name: load()
method.abstract: Loads a view tool and inserts it into the Velocity context.

parameters.parameter: The key string used to insert to newly instantiated tool into the Velocity context.
The name of the class to instantiate.

description.p: Loads a view tool of class class and inserts it into the Velocity context with key key. On order to be loadable, view tools must provide a public constructor with no parameters.
The life cycle of a view tool loaded using this method is the current template request. The instance is processing of the current template has been completet.
If the specified class cannot be found or does not have a public contructor without parameters, then the tool is not loaded and an error message is written to the log.
Loads MathTool with name $math into the context. Then, its random() function is used to generate a random number betweenn 1 and 1000.
